title: Upcycling mixed-material waste with elemental sulfur: applications to plant oil, unseparated biomass, and raw post-consumer food waste
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00104D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bárbara G. S. Guinati, Perla Y. Sauceda Oloño, Nawoda L. Kapuge Dona, Katelyn M. Derr, Shalini K. Wijeyatunga, Andrew G. Tennyson, Rhett C. Smith
Herein we report the preparation of high sulfur-content materials (HSMs) using food waste and elemental sulfur.
